net.wstech2.me.httpsclient

Class CertificateValidationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.io.IOException
          • net.wstech2.me.httpsclient.CertificateValidationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CertificateValidationException
extends java.io.IOException
    Represents an exception occurred during the certificate validation process. The list errors is used to register the errors detected by the validators. See CertificateErrorHandler for additional details about the error types that can throw this exception.
    See Also:
